name: Scarab Research
tag_list: product, recommendations, recommender, cloud, personalization, e-commerce, ecommerce, shopping, experience, artificial-intelligence, machine-learning
overview:
Scarab Research is a global technology startup focusing on large scale data analysis, artificial intelligence and machine learning technologies, personalization and recommendation systems.

Founded in late 2007 by a group of European scientists and IT engineers, Scarab Research is based in Europe and is also present in the US. Tokyo-based corporate IT firm 3NF joined as partners to distribute the Scarab technology to the Japanese enterprise sector.

Scarab Research has successfully marketed some of its research activity, creating the Scarab Product Recommender Platform targeted at e-commerce merchants. The two core products, Scarab Enterprise and Scarab Cloud (a cloud computing implementation of the recommender engine) are now used by a number of online vendors, from small webshops to large customers such as New Yorkâ€™s largest online grocery delivery service FreshDirect.

Scarab Research has accumulated considerable expertise working with very large amounts of data. Scarab has well-established and highly efficient processes, methods and tools to handle a range of tasks including data analysis and data mining, log analysis, working with click based event logs, behavioral analysis and profiling.

It is a core feature of our technology to mine several relations in multiple layers of data, facilitating non-trivial exploitation of catalogs and metadata. This empowers businesses to uncover hidden structures and relationships in their data and produce various levels of recommendations.
